query:
介绍一下Kuaizi Technology这家中国Guangzhou的公司产品。
他主要做Artificial Intelligence (AI), Content Creators, Marketing Automation方面的业务方面。
我需要他进一步的产品介绍，功能介绍，官网链接，服务的客户
answer: Kuaizi Technology (广州筷子信息科技有限公司)是一家专注于AIGC（AI Generated Content）商业化应用的广州创新企业，提供“一站式AI内容平台”Kuaizi Int，涵盖从创意脚本、拍摄、剪辑、配音、翻译、智能混剪到全链路视频分发与运营管理的全流程解决方案，核心功能包括AI脚本写作、全球短视频智能编辑、AI视频分析与热点趋势识别、AI配音与换脸、Avatar 视频生成、视频翻译、智能视频混剪、内容营销自动化工具PubPal以及AI复制与自启动内容代理等，帮助品牌实现高效批量视频生产、精准本地化和营销效果最大化；公司官网为 https://kuaizi.ai（亦可访问 https://kuaizi.cn），截至最新披露已累计服务超4,500家付费客户，覆盖约40个细分行业、500余座城市，典型客户包括全球连锁品牌MINISO（名创优品）、TCL、欧莱雅、宝洁、华为等。

results.title: [Big read] From manufacturing giant to AI leader: Can Guangzhou ...
results.content: Kuaizi Technology, a Guangzhou-based startup specialising in AIGC (Artificial Intelligence Generated Content) for commercial applications, is promoting intelligent content production and collaboration across industries to boost creative output and optimise operations. The car detailing shop example illustrates this approach, where Kuaizi’s AIGC platform provided tailored online marketing solutions. [...] Kuaizi Technology’s product manager, Chen Long, told Lianhe Zaobao that traditional production methods could not keep up with the demand for short videos in today’s commercial market. Kuaizi’s AIGC platform integrates the entire content creation process — scripting, shooting, editing, distribution and workflow management — to improve collaboration efficiency for businesses. [...] Founded in 2013, this tech company saw explosive growth after introducing its cloud-based business software platform in 2020. According to Chen, Kuaizi Technology has doubled its revenue every year for the past three years.

results.title: 内容商业一站式AI应用平台 - Kuaizi筷子科技
results.content: Kuaizi利用自主研发的领先行业模型和全模态数据集，通过生成式AI技术革新商业内容流程，专注于企业市场的内容视频场景。 全面的AIGC

results.title: Kuaizi Int | Global AI Content Platform for Video Marketing ...
results.content:
## Kuaizi AI - Features

### Product Features of Kuaizi AI

### Main Purpose and Target User Group

The main purpose of Kuaizi AI is to empower businesses, from startups to global players, to create, localize, and distribute high-quality video content efficiently and at scale. It focuses on leveraging AI for marketing automation and content creation to drive business growth, especially in international markets. [...] Kuaizi AI is an innovative AIGC (AI-Generated Content) platform designed to empower businesses with intelligent content production and collaborative growth, particularly for global video initiatives. It offers a comprehensive suite of tools to help businesses scale their video content creation and distribution, from understanding global viewer preferences to generating localized viral scripts and producing high-volume video content. Kuaizi AI aims to streamline the entire video marketing [...] To sign up for Kuaizi AI, you can book a demo through the various "Book a Demo" buttons on the homepage, which will initiate the process to get started with their services.

results.title: [PDF] The Impact of AI on the Advertising Process: The Chinese Experience
results.content: It designed 400 million posters for the same annual cam-paign in 2017, roughly 8,000 posters per second. In 2018, Alibaba opened the platform to other players, helping design 6 million posters for 200,000 Taobao vendors dur-ing the November 11 discount campaign. The Leonardo Da Vinci Canvas System—a smart ad design system launched in 2017 offering ad design services to approxi-mately 20,000 online vendors—developed by Qihoo 360, and the Smart Creation System developed by Kuaizi Tech, are also [...] With the application of AI technologies in the field of advertising in China, program-matic buying has become the most important mode of media buying, and a large number of companies have started their programmatic buying business: Alibaba, Qihoo 360, and Kuaizi Tech have developed and deployed ad creation systems; JD and Leo Group have developed smart copywriting systems; and Dentsu Aegis Network has made its foray into AI-driven consumer insight discovery, copywriting, and media planning and [...] upgraded.

results.title: 投资新动态|海珠城发投资筷子科技，布局AIGC应用

results.title: Ogilvy China - 奥美中国在广州成立全新内容中心
results.content:
我们很高兴地向您介绍我们在广州全新成立的内容中心「Content Force 有料」，一个以创意为主，数据驱动及技术支持 , 生意结果为导向的内容解决方案中心。  
  
该中心服务于奥美大中华区所有办公室，旨在为我们的客户提供规模化的高效内容解决方案，以满足其多平台的内容需求，并以社交思维、数据及 AI 科技为驱动引擎，以结果为导向，高效输出触发消费者需求共鸣的跨媒体、跨电商平台内容。  
  
「Content Force 有料」由内容创作者、视频与数字化制作专家、内容电商、社交媒体平台和商业分析专家组成的团队提供支持。该中心的成立使我们能够为客户提供端到端的内容解决方案，并可在以下领域提供服务：创意内容，效果营销，规模化内容生产和内容实时优化。  
  
「Content Force 有料」目前正与数家行业领先的「AI 技术公司」合作，如筷子科技和一面数据，以实现内容创作、内容优化、内容分发和内容效果评估的全链条服务。 [...] 以传播研究赋能数据平台，提供具有影响力的气候问题解决方案
